amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the EPA from retroactively invalidating permits after they have been issued.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-680 to prohibit the EPA from retroactively vetoing a Section 404 Permit under the Clean Water Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 163 (Roll no. 597).
